tool.name: expression
tool.command:
chakin expression add_biomaterial '$biomaterial_name' '$organism_id'
#if $description: --description '$description' #end if #if $biomaterial_provider: --biomaterial_provider '$biomaterial_provider' #end if #if $biosample_accession: --biosample_accession '$biosample_accession' #end if #if $sra_accession: --sra_accession '$sra_accession' #end if #if $bioproject_accession: --bioproject_accession '$bioproject_accession' #end if #if $attributes: --attributes '$attributes' #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: organism_id
param.label: Organism Id
param.help: The id of the associated organism

tool.help:
Add a new biomaterial to the database
